job.title: Network Engineer II
job.description: brbrpstrongTRCAstrong is a leading Managed IT and network services provider founded in 1991 and located in Denton We provide IT and network management support and solutions to small and medium sized businesses nationwidebrbrpbrpWe are seeking a Network amp Desktop Engineer II to join our growing Managed IT Services team As an MSP we work with a very wide range of technologies applications systems people and work cultures and are able to help our technicians gain valuable skills that translate well as you progress in your IT careerbrbrpbrpIf you have a proven track record of working within a team environment successfully addressing challenging IT issues and consistently updating your skills through technical training this could be the role for youbrbrpbrp brbrpbrpstrongThe primary responsibilities of the Network amp Desktop Engineer II arebrbrstrongpbrulbrliManaging maintaining troubleshooting and supporting our users networks equipment software and services remotely with some onsite worklibrliEnsure deployment management and support of PCs peripherals and mobile deviceslibrliTroubleshooting workstation network application and printing issueslibrliTroubleshooting and resolving tickets within SLAs related to operations and enduser requestslibrliCollaborating and working with other staff and vendor support resources to resolve issues and provide effective field support serviceslibrliManage and administer Office 365librliMaintaining customer relationships by providing customers with unbeatable customer serviceliul
